rows.label: qev015204_MSG0004
rows.name:
We've finally started building a large-scale water-
purification plant here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015204_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'd planned to take point myself at first,
seeing as how I'm team leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015204_MSG0006
rows.name:
But Ajoa's the one who's really been driving the project,
so I decided to leave it to her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015204_MSG0007
rows.name:
It's seen its share of troubles so far, but I'm confident
she'll see it through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015204_MSG0001
rows.name:
The issues blocking the project have been cleared up.
Construction's about to start in earnest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015204_MSG0002
rows.name:
Once that plant is up and running as designed,
New LA's water problems will evaporate overnight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015204_MSG0003
rows.name: Ha ha! No one can resist a good hydrology joke![ST:wait ]
